entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who initially reacted to Harry's loss of gold.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the one who shared information about Bagman's troubles with goblins.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan's dad had trouble getting money off Bagman.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as someone who borrowed gold from goblins and lost everything to gambling.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as the ones who took Bagman's gold and followed him to Hogwarts.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who shared information about Bagman's bet on Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who won the tournament and had gold taken from him.

relationships.description: Bagman borrowed loads of gold off goblins, but it wasn't enough to cover all his debts.
Bagman put a bet on Harry to win the tournament in an attempt to pay back the goblins.
